Black', 'Robert H. Justman', 'Gene L. Coon'], 'Starring': ['William Shatner', 'Leonard Nimoy', 'Deforest Kelley']} Been watching ST:TOS since it was aired. This remastered edition gives the show some of the special effects that were not available back when it was originally filmed. Of course, some think this is sacrilege to the original episodes.

Also, the master film was digitally cleaned up, removing some of the old scratches and washed out colors.
